title: Video Maker with music & pictures & Video Editor
features: Create video photo slideshow with music with only 3 steps:
1 - Choose your favorite photos to make slide show photo with music.
2 - Choose the visual effects, add your favorite music, add stickers, edit, playback and save.
3 - Share slideshow maker with music on social network
Crop video to remove watermark or any unwanted part.
Make video with music and save video to your phone.
Editing video to maker video longer and export video in HD quality.
Share video to YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, etc.
description: Video Maker Of Photos With Song & Video Editor content rating is EveryoneVideo Editor/Movie Maker You can use fast motion/slow motion to adjust and control the speed of every video clip. Video Maker also provide video reverse and video playback function to make funny and creative original videos.Export: Video Maker provides 720P/1080P HD export with no quality loss, no duration limit. Support video formats like MP4, MOV, AVI. You can save the video or slideshow to your draft or album at any time. Besides blurred background, voice enhancement and audio speed adjustment features makes the video and slideshow you export more appealing.Video Speed ControlAdjust video speed with video filters and video effects.Fast/Slow motion full screen video maker and free video trimmer and movie maker app.Speed up videos or add slow motion.
